name: HUNGRY (Slaur3n)
description:
He woke up hungry, and with his knife and fork, he started eating.

Theme : Health Mechanics

This game was made for the "Reload Magazine x In The Keep Mini Game Jam #1". 

The game is a bit short right now, but I got some funny ideas to add if continue working on it.

!!!ATTENTION!!!

Going in settings-audio will crash the game. Please turn up your volume manually.
